Player History
Injured on 6/9/1965 with a Pulled Bicep Muscle, out for 3 weeks...
Had first career hit on 4/9/1966, off Sandy Koufax (PHI)...
Earned first career win on 4/9/1966...
Hit first career homerun on 4/6/1968, off Sandy Koufax (PHI)...
Injured on 4/15/1968 with a Sore Back, out for 1-2 weeks...
Traded from Chicago (N) to San Francisco on 5/31/1968 (Going to SF: P T. McGraw, 3B R. Santo. Going to CHC: P J. Kern, C J. Harrell)...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/16/1970, winning 2 games with a 1.62 ERA...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 10/1/1970, going 2-3, 0.83...
Was selected to the 1971 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/28/1971, winning 2 games with a 0.00 ERA...
Was selected to the 1972 Allstar game...
Was selected to the 1973 Allstar game...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 8/1/1973, going 6-0, 0.89...
Injured on 9/15/1973 with a Ruptured Bicep Tendon, out for 5 weeks...
Won World Series with San Francisco in 1973...
